review: IS THIS SPECIFIC ONE ALREADY FULLY LOADED ?
author: David allen

review: The stick has by far exceeded my expectations! I'm so happy with it and all of its features.
author: deray

review: I am seriously considering returning it!!!  It is very limited in what is available.  Roku has so, so, so very much more available.  Also, it is difficult to navigate.  The printing is so small that I must get up and go read it.  Details are scarce.  I am very disappointed!
author: Amazon Customer

review: This is by far the best TV stick to get- when you compare the processors and other abilities of the Roku and Apple TV. My only complaint is that it sometimes freaks out and sends you back to the home screen when you are trying to find something to watch. Other than that I have no complaints- great storage space and flexibility to travel!
author: SCW

review: I don't know what took us so long to get it.  We love it, great product at a great price.
author: Avid Reader

review: Love it but really needs a internet browser
author: Chris
